doc.headline: Did I hear this right?
doc.post:
I thought I just heard on the news that there's 'talk' of releasing the Yorkshire Ripper, as doctors have been 'reported' as saying he no longer poses a threat?
WTF? :curse:

I thought I just heard on the news that there's 'talk' of releasing the Yorkshire Ripper, as doctors have been 'reported' as saying he no longer poses a threat?
WTF? :curse:
Not quite... considering moving him to a medium security place

I watched a documentry about him recently, after he was arrested he convinced doctors he suffered from schizophrenia, when in fact he was as sane as the next man, he is just an evil bastard, he knew what he was doing when he murdered those women, it was his wife who suffered from schizophrenia, he had mastered her behaviour for years & was able to convince the doctors who assessed him at the time..

To some he is innocent... we did have a dullard on here ( Noel O'Gara) who wrote a book aout it...claiming the real murderer was a Billy Tracey...
